title: Short Stories For Early Reading: Includes 16 Original Stories with Covers
description: These stories are full of great lessons for growing kids and lovable characters that kids will look up to. You will love reading these to your young ones and watching them learn to read in the process.Parents and grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their children and grandchildren.** Click "Buy Now with 1 Click" to reserve your copy forever**Grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren.
author: Betty J. Byers
